feed.title: Saulâ€™s Portfolio
feed.subtitle:
I work at BNY as a Data Science Analyst in their rotational program. I graduated with a Data Science degree from Purdue University and I'm currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at Georgia Tech.
I'm passionate about solving data challenges across the full stack. When I'm not working through code (or fixing my own bugs), you can find me running around NYC or hanging out with family and friends.
